meanings.definition: A type of leavened, oven-baked flatbread common in South Asian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The naans smelled delicious as they baked in the oven.
meanings.sent2: We ordered some naans to go with our curry.
meanings.sent3: The chef juggled the naans like a pro, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The naans were like fluffy clouds on our plates.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked naans filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Plural form of naan, referring to multiple pieces of the bread.
meanings.sent1: She served a variety of naans at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The naans were stacked high on the buffet table.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a naans-eating contest at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The naans on the platter disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The warm naans were a hit with the guests.

meanings.definition: The act of making or consuming naan bread.
meanings.sent1: Her naans-making skills improved with each batch.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the naans-making class at the culinary school.
meanings.sent3: He performed a magic trick while making naans, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The family tradition of naans-making brought them closer.
meanings.sent5: The joy of naans-consuming brought smiles to their faces.
